text: My Version is 3.0.2 Final of POI Classes

Is the problem that some sheets come out in the wrong order, or that some sheets come out twice, and others not at all?

(eg 10 -> 10, 11 -> 10, 12 -> 12, or 10 -> 10, 11 -> 12, 12 -> 11, 13 -> 13)

Also, if you load the file up in excel, and do save as, does the resulting file work properly with poi, or do you still have the same issue?
creator: apache@gagravarr.org

text:
Are some of the sheets hidden?

Are some of them chart sheets?

If so then you might try with the latest 3.5beta5. If this fails then it would help if you would attach a file, or perhaps ask a question on the user list.
